note.p: Birth: Tangier Park, Hampshire, England (04 November 1829)
Education: Winchester College; Oxford University; Lincoln's Inn. MA, DSc
Career: Fellow of Corpus Christi College, Oxford; studied natural history; influential in building up the Zoological Society
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1913-1914 vol 87 pp iii-v signed by F D G
Notes: Thomas Bell has signed election certificate twice
